item.title: Homework 1: Setup and Git Basics
item.description: Submission details All steps should be completed no later than 10:30am EST on Mon 9/14, but I highly recommend aiming to have them done by Wed 9/9 so that your literature review repository will be available over the weekend. The specific steps: Follow the directions below to get Git, GitHub, R, RStudio and Stata working on your computer Commit and push at least a skeleton file to your lit-review-gitusername repo as described below Post at least one comment, question, or answer on the #hw1-git Slack channel Respond to my pinned “Is Stata installed on your computer?
